name: Gun Raiders
abstract: Gun Raiders is a free-to-play VR shooter!  Chat with friends while you mow down enemies in multiple game modes while jetpacking through the air or climbing from wall to wall monkey-style!

detail.app_release_note:
Patch Notes 0.8.211 - Raider Workshop + Battle Royale Updates

Big mid-season update!  We'd like to introduce the Raider Workshop: Community Created Maps.  If you want to create a map and put it into the game, please jump into our Discord #map-discussion channel for how to get started!  Big thanks to our inaugural map creators ClanUniverse5, Cr0bis, NoobsGameBest and stealthy12.

- New: Raider Workshop.  5 new user created maps
- New: Battle Royale weapon power levels (weapons have the chance to drop with increasing power levels giving damage boosts)
- New: Battle Royale Power Up Potions (hub potions in Battle Royale!)
- New: Battle Royale Mutators: 4 player squads and 10v10.
- New: You can drop your weapons for your teammates in Battle Royale
- New: Change your vote on the map vote screen after a match
- Community skins
- Bug fixes
detail.app_supported_platforms: PICO 4, PICO Neo3 Link, PICO 4 Pro
